summary: All modifications preserve game mechanics integrity. New content correctly represents the core 4d6 resolution system, DC ladder, outcome tiers, and Clock mechanics.

chapters_reviewed.notes: Quick Start correctly summarizes the standard attribute array. Rella example demonstrates proper attribute distribution and skill/proficiency selection.
Probability calculations accurate: +0 = ~38%, +1 = ~50%, +2 = ~62% at DC 14. Bounded design explanation preserves system intent.
Resolution walkthrough accurately demonstrates full Check procedure. When-to-roll examples correctly apply three-part test. Attribute selection key words align with system design.
Tag Effects Quick Reference accurately categorizes effect types. Condition roleplay guidance doesn't alter mechanical effects. Dual-clock pattern correctly explained.
Tick values (Critical=3, Full=2, Partial=1, Failure=0) are consistent baseline values. Stakes/taken-out guidance preserves fiction-first design. Turn order options match existing guidance.
